summary: Removes the facial hair restrictions of each race (except beast races)
descriptionHtml:
What this mod does is allow all the beards (Except for Khajiit and Argonian facial features and hair) in character creation to be used by any race other than beast races (Khajiit and Argonian). 

Want to have the epic wizard beard on your high elf? 
Done. 

The only issue is that it doesn\'t apply to khajiit and Argonians, they still have their default beards/facial features; and other races can\'t use theirs. This is a problem with the creation kit and settings for beards.

This mod is also available on steam, under the same name, so if you\'d rather use that then feel free =)

Please endorse and leave a comment if you like it, or just a comment saying what you didn\'t like about it (if you didn\'t like it), and please, do enjoy.
author: Osdiaus
